reviews: My realtor , Karson, has display many qualities that I liked. He had answered all my questions regarding the real-estate market: trends, pricing in near-by neighborhoods, rental prices, many more.He was always punctual. He had answer my many phone calls any time of day (once even @ 11:pm). I find most impressive was the 3-D virtual tour of my place.

Karson is a true professional. Beyond being competent, detail-oriented, tech-savvy, and aware of the market trends, he offers an exceptional level of service. As a first-time home buyer, I was made to feel fully confident and well-equipped to view potential homes, understand my options as a buyer, and get a feel for what was a fair price. Karson went the extra mile to schedule viewings that worked for my schedule, get info from the seller's agent to pre-screen homes before making an appointment, and dug up recent home sales history in the same area that I was looking in, to do a price comparison for value.
He was also my advocate when liaising with the seller's agent, and kept track of many details for my sake. Absolutely recommend Karson.

Karson was extremely professional and helpful in helping us find a new home in this difficult market. He has a great understanding of the market and provided a lot of recommendations that we were not aware of. I would definitely ask for his service again.

Karson was great at helping us find our new home. He was always fast to reply and he was always very patient with us. I also appreciated his feedback and suggestions as he concerns to our attention that may not be apparent right away. Karson is also willing to go above and beyond when needed to such as booking us last minute viewings and researching trends in the market. I would recommend him to anyone.

We previously worked with Karson in 2016 for the sale of our condo and purchase of a townhouse and his professionalism, honesty and work ethic is why we went with him again to sell our current townhouse and purchase our current home. What's great about Karson is that when we want to get emotional about things he is chill and not in a bad way. He loves the numbers - what was sold in your area, for how much, who asked for too much, etc. all to determine the likely value your home would sell for - but he also works with your requests. So in that essence he uses his own knowhow with your goals to make it a real team effort. He assembled excellent photography, 3D tour of the home, a video, and got these out all over the internet, and the fact that we had 20 showings during the pandemic on the weekend demonstrated the time and effort he put in to get our place out there. Karson works until the deal is done. Where I would see other agents clearly cut corners on things, Karson is a closer - he sees things through to the end. As a result, because he did the work to see what other homes like ours were selling in the area, we were able to apply that info to guide our offer on our home and got a fair price on the home we purchased. He attended the home inspection of our new place to ensure it went smoothly - above and beyond stuff. I would absolutely recommend Karson - with so many agents to choose from, it's nice to know this one will work for you.

I have used Karson four times, each time his service has always been able to tailor his services to match my needs . His Service is always professional and outstanding. He also is very knowledge about the real estate market I would and have recommend Karson to be a selling or buying real estate agent to others

Really good agent. Helped a lot with buying our condo. Really helpful with everything and every step of the way. Taught us a lot of the process of buying the condo getting our mortgage and every little things that involved buying the property.
Great realtor, friendly, smart, and always keep his clients best interest at heart. I would use him again and so would my friends and family.

I knew Karson from a recommendation of a friend. I chose Karson as my realtor as his assistant, who is Korean, could help me with better translation and understanding, and ultimately as Karson previously dealt complicated real-estate problem successfully from a friend of mine. It was the first time purchasing, which made things a little confusing and complicated in the beginning, but fortunately Karson was able to walkthrough the process step by step, with a level of detail I appreciated. Karson Wong is a very professional real estate agent. He doesn't hesitate to help his client at the time that is most convenient and needed, and willingly reaches out further to give extra helpful information that is beneficial to acknowledge. During the meetings he always take a moment to give you chance to ask any question that comes to mind or remind any details that are good to know. What I appreciated about dealing with Karson was that he is thorough. There was one time he brought a Gopro camera during the inspection to record all the details that happened during the inspection, and later sent video link. It was helpful as those are easily forgettable. I would recommend Karson's services to my friend or anyone that is looking to involve in real-estate dealing. If you feel like your experience or knowledge in real-estate is not as good, especially for first time buyers like myself, you will appreciate the level of detail that he will go through to ensure that you meet your expectation.

Karson is a diligent and a punctual thorough professional. I met Karson through a common friend (who is a realtor in Calgary) while I was looking to buy a new home in Vancouver Area. I knew the area that I wanted to buy a property. In our first meeting, which, due to COVID, was a telephonic one, I explained Karson what exactly we (my wife and I) were looking for. Karson regularly sent us details of the properties that matched our requirements, till we found the one that we loved. During this time, he helped us look at multiple properties and with every 'showing' he was able to understand our requirements better. During the final transactions, we were out of town. He liaised with the home inspector and got the home inspection done and then held a live video conference to let us know the result. He made a video of entire home inspection and then sent it to us. He went above and beyond to ensure that our absence did not impact our decision. Karson is a trustworthy and reliable realtor who works in the interest of his clients. I recommend him to anyone who is looking to buy a property in Vancouver Area, especially if you are busy and can not run around to do the leg work. Overall, I would rate him 10/10.

Second time using Karson and his service was outstanding again. He is very professional and knowledgeable. He communicates every step of the way and provides excellent advice to help his clients achieve their goals. Would definitely recommend to others.

May 16th 2015 Yaletown condo selling review
It is very exciting and honored to have this great opportunity of leaving a positive review for our hard working, smart, and experienced real estate agent, Karson Wong. We had started our relationship as a agent and clients on May in 2015. My wife and I had an initial meeting with Karson and he prepared very detailed and professional presentation for us to have better understanding of market status, value of our property, and how buying/selling works. After the meeting, my wife and I had decided to work with Karson. One of the biggest reasons why we had chosen Karson was because Karson was not 'forcing' his strategies to us like other agents did. My wife and I had met and talked with few other agents before we met Karson, even some of the agents were rude and ignoring our expectations. Where as Karson, he fully understood and accomodated with our situations and needs. During the negotiating time, he had stayed with us until very late night for us to get as perfect as possible deal.
We were deeply impressed with his passion and professionalism as a real estate agent and showed us how and what the real customer service supposed to be.
After he helped us for selling our yaletown condo, we had a chance to strongly recommend Karson to our friend family, and they were also completely amazed by professional skills and attitude of Karson Wong. Hopefully more and more people have same chance of working with Karson like we did for selling and buying properties.
There will be absolutely no regret. Thank you.

Karson is a very detail-orientated agent, and we would definitely recommend him to family and friends. Our experience with him selling our place was so positive that we did not hesitate to ask him to help us look for a new home. He carefully listens and understands our criteria. Karson is very knowledgeable and he has made the processes stress-free for us. It was a pleasure working with Karson and would absolutely ask him to represent us again in the future.

Karson was very punctual and made time to meet our schedule. He provided us with a booklet of all the similar buildings which had been sold in the last couple years. He talked to us about managing our expectations when expecting price negotiations. We sold our apartment only a couple of weeks after it was put on the market, and at a better rate than was expected.

Karson was very pleasant and upfront about expectations regarding selling our apartment. We were able to get a reasonable price in a very short time. He knew the surrounding area well and was very detailed in explaining strategies to sell. We recommend him to anyone else who needs to buy or sell a home.

I had two experiences to buy a presale condo with him. He is so kind and meticulous. The most important things when people buy a home are actual informations such as price change, investment potential, the value of the home, appropriate size of my life style and the convenience in real estate market. He has enough informations and good opinion for each customer. When customer has some concerns, he advices on it with actual, proper and detailed solution. He is also responsible person so he takes care of all when it may happen after contract. That's why I had already recommended him to my friends to buy and sell a home. One of my friend is so meticulous and a little strict person. He is satisfied with all proceeds with him. His family are willing to proceed with next opportunity. One of his merit is language. He can cover other languages such as Chinese and Korean.
Karson is very knowledgeable, patient and courteous. He will work his hardest to attend to your needs. 100% satisfied and will definitely refer him to friends and family.
He is one of the best realtor I ever had. He works non stop. He marketed our place really well. He looked out for our best interest.

Choosing Karson was the best choice ever in the purchase of our home. He was able to help us nail down the exact house that we had wanted for months, and negotiated a price that exceeded our expectations. He literally went the extra mile far and beyond for our family. Karson was more than just a realtor in this emotional roller coaster process for us - he was our counselor, our mentor, our guidance, and our friend. He's always responsive to all calls and messages, he gives the most professional and valuable advice, he's also very patient and empathetic to our situation. We cannot thank him enough. Thank you, Karson!

Being an owner of various properties in the lower mainland. I have worked with a number of Realtors across different companies. Working with Karson from Remax was a great experience for my last purchase. He was by far the most attentive to details and efficient to work with, and always a phone call away to my needs. While I considered myself an experienced owner and investor, I always appreciate Karson’s tips and knowledge throughout the entire experience of the purchase. I think being a successful realtor not only means able to sell and close your sale, but really understand the clients’ needs and able to offer exceptional service through the whole purchasing journey. If you are looking to work with someone like that I would recommend Karson!

Karson is an honest and dedicated professional who prioritizes customer service. Being a first time home buyer (with a limited budget) in a competitive Vancouver real estate market, I was intimidated to start my home buying process. However, Karson was supportive, patient and committed to making sure I was comfortable from start to completion of my new home. What I appreciated the most was that he always responsive to emails, text and phone calls and made time for you even on the weekends and late in the evening. Furthermore, his knowledge of the local housing market and houses/condos in general is top notch. From the start, I could tell that his best interest was to help me find a home that would match my budget and personal needs. I would recommend Karson to anyone looking to purchase a home without hesitation. Thank you Karson for all your help and hopefully I have the pleasure to work with you again in the future!

Karson is very professional, punctual, and patient. He takes the time to make sure that you understand every procedure involved in the transaction. He’s very customer oriented and genuinely focuses more on the service side of the business. He looks out for his clients and makes sure that the process is smooth for everyone in the transaction. I would highly recommend Karson for those looking to buy their first home or investment property as he is very knowledgeable in his field. He is also very detailed oriented when it comes to the pros and cons of a property. Again, highly recommended to those who want to work with an agent who genuinely cares for his clients.

My husband and I were first-time buyers and felt very lucky to have Karson as our agent. He was very professional, knowledgable, and patient. We were very well informed with all the important information as Karson explained each step with great detail. We deeply appreciated his expertise and work ethic. We had a newborn and it was so helpful to have flexible schedule offered by Karson for house viewing tours. We felt very calm during the buying process with Karson's excellent support. We've been very pleased by his services and would recommend him without any hesitation.

I and my wife had a great experience working with Karson. We couldn't be happier with the result. At first, we has a hard time to deal with the real estate market of Vancouver, processes, negotiations, and all the details that could affect in decision making. We got overwhelmed and frustrated by the one of the biggest financial decision of our lives. I truely believe we were so lucky to have Karson. He is experienced, knowledgeable, reliable, professional, honest, responsible, and friendly. He guided us with his knowledge, experience, and market analysis. Also, he was very professional in arranging all the other parties including sellers' realtors, financial, inspection, legal to make the overall process silk smooth. With his help, we could make a very satisfying decision. I will definately call him again without a single second hesitation for any future buyings or sellings. I will recommend him with confidence to anyone around me who wants to buy or sell a property in Vancouver. Just saying 'thank you' is never enough to express our appreciation. Thank you again, Karson.

We were totally pleased with Karson Wong's performance. He was pleasant, listened well and was very well informed with market trends in our are. He came highly recommended by a previous client of his who lives in the same complex with us. We have no hesitation to recommend him to our friends and other prospective parties wishing to buy or sell.
Good luck, Karson
Peter and Ruth Karius

With Karson's professional help, I found a place that is exactly I was looking for. I am extremely satisfied with his professionalism, attention to detail, and ability to assess your needs vs budget. Karson is also constantly looking for opportunity to add value to your home-purchase experience. He is very knowledgeable and experienced. I'd definitely recommend Karson as your real-estate agent. I'd certainly look for him again when looking for an upgrade in future.

Karson has 10+ years experience in real estate industry in Metro Vancouver. He is a detailed person and work very hard, always able to proactively consider the pro/con for his clients. He is a responsible person and always try to find solutions for the issues. I am very happy with Karson’s service.

I would describe my overall experience with Karson's service to be excellent. My thoughts about Karson's personality is that he is very responsible, organized, and hard working. Being a overseas purchaser, i was impossible for me to be present to visit the open houses. However, Karson would visit open houses for us along with taking video recordings of the house as well as videos of the surroundings of the buildings and roads. Also, Karson would give professional advices on pricing as he is familiar with different prices in different areas( Vancouver, Burnaby, Coquitlam, Richmond, White Rock.). I choose Karson as my realtor because I trust him as a professional. He is responsible and he would give advices based on the fundamentals of investments and weighting out the pros and cons of each investment. I appreciate most as a client when dealing with Karson is his work ethnic. I would recommend Karon's services to my friends because he is a professional that can be trusted.

I was very comfortable when buying real estate because Karson Wong was a professional and driving force as a realtor. I believe he has the ability to cope with market trends. He is a realtor who works as a team with his wife who speaks Chinese, English, and Korean and does his best for customers. So, I want to ask him to buy and sell my house in the future and introduce him to my friends as well.
Thanks to Karson, we were able to sell 2 properties. Karson helped us with his vast knowledge of the real estate market and gave us some advice on how to make our properties marketable. Great job!
He knows how to help customer. And he is best seller and also buyer agent. I spend my time to sell my confo and buy townhouse for 5 months. I sm very hsppy eith him

Karson在帮我们挑选合适的房子时候非常有耐心。尽管我们看了许多许多房源都没有做决定， Karson 还是非常耐心的建议我们，再提供合适我们的房子。很少有经纪不会催促你做决定，K arson尊重我们对每个房源的意见，不会催促我们。在帮我们卖房子的时候，Karson 做了很多open house.帮我们卖到了期望的价格。以后的房子买卖我们都会选择Karson的团队。
Karson is very patient and he worked hard to find best fit properties for us to view. He respected our decisions on every property we viewed and never push you to rush decisions to buy. We would like to recommend Karson to you and we will keep trust Karson as team for our future real estate purchases and sells.

We were first-time buyers, and we needed a lot of hand-holding. Karson was very knowledgeable and patient, explained all the necessary details step by step. Drove us to a number of open houses at the beginning, and helped us come to a reasonable decision given the price range and location we were considering. Eventually, it was clear to us what type of place (e.g., sq ft, room number, which floor) would be good for us, and Karson was able to inform all the details about the places we were interested in. Ultimately, no matter which agent you use, buyer need to make a decision about what he really wants, rank his priorities accordingly, and most importantly, should verify all the recommendations from multiple sources. First-time buyers are not generally aware of this process, and that’s where an agent can help. Karson helped us come to that decision and explained the process well, responded to my requests quickly, recommended suitable services (e.g., home inspection, bank), assigned a different agent for a situation when he could not be available, had a good understanding with the seller's agent, and suggestions were constructive and helpful. As first-time buyers, we learned a lot from Karson, happy with his services and would recommend without hesitation.

Karson Wong has demonstrated excellent customer focus and service, excellent market knowledge, work ethic, and professional integrity. He also handled the sale of our condo with selling price exceeding our expectation within a very short period of time. We credit Karson with a smooth, stress-free home buying and selling experience. We are very pleased with Karson and his expertise and we recommend him to everyone.
He is Very friendly, and we felt comfortable to discuss about new property anytime. He show and gave us tons of options we could quickly make decision when we found right place.

Karson was very professional in helping me select my home. He waited in line 5 days on December just to help me buy the presale of my choice,even though he injured his left knee and just came out of surgery not too long ago! Thanks again,Karson.

I'm very happy to recommend Karson Wong,
From the beginning of the process, through to completing the sale, his knowledgeable and professional approach made the process of buying our first home a smooth one.
Karson's real estate understanding is comprehensive, from larger market trends, to financing, to neighborhood values, right down to the pros and cons of different building materials. There wasn't a question that I threw at him, that he couldn't answer with thoughtful and helpful information.
Buying a first home, especially in a very hot market like the Lower Mainland of B.C., can be a stressful and daunting experience. Working with Karson helped to relieve a lot of that stress, and give us a great deal of confidence and assurance.
I am happy to report that with Karson's help, we found a home that we love, in the area that we wanted, that checks all of our boxes.
I will certainly turn to Karson in future if and when I am again in need of an agent to help buy or sell a home.
Cheers,
Chris Rae
My agent is a very responsible person! He helps me a lot in buying new room, analyzing the market situation and explaining every items in a professional way. Excellent agents!

He is a professional and does impressive job because he takes good care of every single individual client. He will be right there with you and for you no matter where and when you are, if there is must-have opportunities for either buying or selling property. He double checks and triple checks like 'HE' buys his own properties. And to his clients, it's always beneficial that Karson and his partner can fluently speak multiple languages to support clients in various situations. Yes we live in such a multicultural city, and Karson his Jennifer is perfectly ideal for your business in this adventurous real estate market. They walk through with you from scratch to the successful completion. For this reason, not only Karson and Jennifer is just agents to us, but also good friends for years and years. We want to never stop to refer Karson and Jennifer to people I know.

Without any doubt my wife and I chose Karson Wong to be our agent and filled every expectation (plus) we had. From our initial examination of our home to the final sale Karson Wong was a professional who walked us through each step and explained in detail what to expect. We highly recommend him and again personally thank him for making a complex transaction for us so easy. We would not only reuse him but recommend this professional to all who need his excellent services.

Karson is a very detailed-oriented professional. He will make sure you are comfortable with your purchase given your financial situation and market trends with real estate and your purpose of purchasing the property (i.e to live in / investment), highly recommended !!

Karson is professional and helpful. He is good at his area and also considering your family's needs. He is always patient for your questions and ready with solutions.
Karson 能够为客户考虑到各方面的需求，耐心，而且有经验，为我们在决定前提供足够的预案选择，让我们有所准备(包括实际行动以及心理上的准备)，所以非常推荐他！
Mr. Wong is a very professional agent. He helped us learn about purchased in, listened our requests, and answered our questions. He real knew what we want and gave us a good service.

Karson Wong is a very dedicated agent. He works for his clients harder than any agent I used to work before.
To make my comment short, I will use his service again if I have a need for another property.
Karson is an honest and very hard working realtor who tries his best to look for the best deals for his clients. Great service and I would definitely go back to him again.
I found Karson to be very professional and well organized. His knowledge and helpfulness in selling our home provided us with peace of mind throughout the entire process.

Karson was amazing to work with. He helped us find the house of our dreams in the area we wanted. He gave us great advice on exactly what to do to. He sold our townhouse quickly in one weekend of open houses. He is professional, personable, organized, efficient and he really cared about finding the right home for our family. If you want to find a home or sell your home, Karson is the best person to work with.

Karson is knowledgeable, accessible, hard working, and efficient. He provide us with plenty reference listings to help us make decisions. He is more client oriented, meaning using his knowledge to help us make decisions rather than imposing his opinion on us. We are very satisfied with his help.

Very honest .. and even if the deal is done he still helps me if i ask questions or help .. awesome guy.. not like previous real estate agent that if the deal is done they don't even bother check on you not like karson he's so awesome .. wish more honest real estate agent like him..giving him 101% beyond expectations..

Karson was everything we were looking for in a real estate agent: knowledgeable, patient, trustworthy and smart. He did a great job negotiating the sale of our townhouse and expertly negotiated the purchase of our new house. I give him the highest recommendation possible.
